entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
